thread.title: BRIEF-Genesis Energy Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Common Unit $0.07

title: BRIEF-Genesis Energy Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Common Unit $0.07

organizations.name: brief-genesis energy reports qtrly net loss per common unit

text:
May 4, 2018 / 10:11 AM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Genesis Energy Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Common Unit $0.07 Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - Genesis Energy LP: * GENESIS ENERGY, L.P. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* GENESIS ENERGY LP - QTRLY NET LOSS PER COMMON UNIT $0.07
* GENESIS ENERGY LP - QTRLY REVENUES $725.8 MILLION VERSUS $415.5 MILLION
* GENESIS ENERGY - “REMAIN ON TRACK WITH OUR PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED GUIDANCE FOR VISIBLE, ACHIEVABLE LONG TERM DISTRIBUTION GROWTH” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
